head.supplied: Immediate ¶ ¶ ¶ ¶ (Copy) ¶ Public Service Board, ¶ Melbourne, 11th Jan. 1886. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to forward herewith lists of the officers of the Department of the Honorable the Chief Sec...

div.p: No.101, pp. 1479-80, unit 71, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria

Melbourne, 11th Jan. 1886.
Document is a circular (p. 1479) to the heads of 14 departments (listed p. 1480).

I have the honor to forward herewith lists of the officers of the Department of the Honorable the Chief Secretary shewing changes effected since January last year, and the corrections, according to information furnished to the Public Service Board.

In order to admit of the publication of new lists during the present month in compliance with Section 25 of Act 773 I am particularly to request you to be so good as to cause the lists to be revised and returned to this office during the present week.

Your attention is specially invited to the recorded salaries of officers, which doubtless in very many instances require alteration owing to the receipt of increments since the publication of the last record, and I am also to request that the new officers shown to have been appointed may be placed in their proper relative positions on the lists.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;
font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;
font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;

div.p: The accompanying list of officers is forwarded to the Government Botanist with a request that he will be good enough to have it carefully revised in the manner indicated in the above letter and retun it to me with the least possible delay , so that I may be able to comply with the Board's request for the return of the paper this week.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;
